Equipment Actions.Action 1: Chain, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 11 Slashing, Can Grapple.  A grappled creature takes an Average 7 Piercing damage at the start of its turn

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Devil makes 2 attacks with its Chains
Other Actions.Action 2: Animate Chains, The Chain Devil magically animates up to 4 chains it can see with razor-edged barbs.  When the Chain Devil uses Multiattack, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack.  These chains can also grapple creatures but can not attack while grappling a creature
Other Actions.Action 3: Unnerving Mask, The Chain Devil can create the illusion that it looks like a creature's departed loved one or bitter enemy.  The creature must succeed a Wisdom saving throw or be Frightened, Reaction

Abilities.Ability 1: Devil's Sight, Magical darkness doesn't impede the Devil's darkvision
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
